page.title: 10WROXALL: THE VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: { {The school}was built in 1863 and has two classrooms,a hall,a lobby,a kitchen and two toilets. There are{29 {pupils.}Last year there were 24 and the year before,40.The number varies. They start school at{9.0am}and finish at{3.30pm. {Four}pupils have{school meals,}which are delivered in a van,and the rest have{packed lunches;}none of the children go home for lunch. This is a school rule,partly because only{two children live in the village.They are Sally Wing and her brother, who live in Manor Lane. There are{two teachers}at the school. The headmistress is called Mrs.Trolley and she has been the headmistress since September 1983.Mrs. Grimes is the other teacher,and there is also a part-time cleaner and caretaker.
